adrFormatAddress: 660 1st Ave. # 7, New York, NY 10016-3295, USA

originalText.text:
Dr, Peter.Nelson is a brilliant and caring Dr,   When my husband had stenosis of the Carotid Artery, he placed stents to allow the blood to flow normally,

I felt so confident from the moment I met with and spoke with this amazing physician.
He is not only a genius but a Dr who gives you confidence and tranquility,

More than 5 stars for Dr Kim Nelson!!,

text.text:
Dr, Peter.Nelson is a brilliant and caring Dr,   When my husband had stenosis of the Carotid Artery, he placed stents to allow the blood to flow normally,

I felt so confident from the moment I met with and spoke with this amazing physician.
He is not only a genius but a Dr who gives you confidence and tranquility,

More than 5 stars for Dr Kim Nelson!!,

originalText.text: Dr. Nelson saved my life, not once but twice. He gives his full attention to you when you talk about and describe symptoms. His attention to detail in observing his patience surpasses any doctor I have ever seen.  He found an AVM that was driving me crazy. I could hear a "heartbeat" in my ear for weeks and one one else did. I was sent to him by the grace of god. After 10 hour surgery by Dr. Nelson and his team, no more "heartbeat". Then 2 week post op check up, just while talking and observing me, he felt I had a blood clot. 5 O'clock on a Friday, and he put me in a wheel chair,  took me to cat scan, where he along with the technician found a PE, and Multiple clots in my right leg. If he was a different doctor just concerned about getting home on a Friday afternoon, I would have died before I left the building. I will never forget him or his "dream team". I have since had two more Anglo grams and all right as he left it.

originalText.text: Amazing Doctor!! Compassionate. Explains procedure and answers any and all questions. The staff that surrounds him is just as amazing. One of the best if not the best bed side manors.
